text: haey yeung ban thveu aoy popk bang chea mlob leu puok anak haey yeung ban banhchouh mean na( chea braphet chamnei del mean rosacheate phaem) ning satv kruoch aoy puok anak . chaur puok anak briphok chamneiahar la del yeung ban bratan aoy puok anak . haey puokke minban thveubeab yeung laey phtoytowvinh puokke te del ban thveubeab khluoneng noh
